alert.note: Alert for Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 02 at 2:27AM MDT until April 03 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 11 PM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...In Colorado, Uncompahgre Plateau and Dallas Divide. In Utah, La Sal and Abajo Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 11 PM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive. People, especially those with respiratory illnesses, heart disease, the elderly, and children are recommended to stay indoors and avoid prolonged outdoor exercise or heavy exertion due to wind-blown dust.
